revised_title: Forces on a Body Moving Through a Viscous Fluid: Asymptotic Solutions and Applications
tldr: The author investigates the forces experienced by a body moving through a viscous fluid, focusing on the asymptotic flow field at large distances from the body. The study provides explicit formulae for the force and couple acting on the body, applicable to various shapes and motions, and offers insights into the influence of the far field on the drag, side force, and couple experienced by the body.
